name: FireGuard 5/8 in. x 4 ft. x 12 ft. Gypsum Board
description: Sheetrock Brand Firecode Core 5/8 in. x 4 ft. x 12 ft. Gypsum Board offers easy installation and almost immediate decoration. Panels are easy to score and snap.
